Dear [Client's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to you with a heavy heart to sincerely apologize for breaching our confidentiality agreement. I understand the importance of trust and confidentiality in our professional relationship, and I deeply regret any distress this situation may have caused you.

There is no excuse for my actions, and I take full responsibility for the breach. I recognize that my failure may have jeopardized not only our relationship but also the integrity of the information you entrusted to me. Please rest assured that I am taking immediate steps to rectify this situation and to ensure that it never happens again.

I value the relationship we have built and truly appreciate your understanding as I work to regain your trust. If there is anything I can do to remedy this situation or to provide reassurance, please do not hesitate to let me know.

Once again, I am truly sorry for my mistake. I hope to be able to move forward together, taking this experience as a lesson to improve my commitment to our partnership.

Thank you for your understanding.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Company]  
[Your Contact Information]
